head.supplied: Port Darwin ¶ 9th May 1883 ¶ Respected Baron ¶ ¶ With this post I am sending you a plant whose name I would much like to know. The seed of this plant must have been imported here in hay, it sprang up...

div.p: RB MSS M61, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MS found with a specimen of Alysicarpus indet. (MEL 715445). Port Darwin

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Bei dieser Post schicke ich Ihnen eine Pflanze dessen Namen ich gern wissen möchte, der Saame dieser Pflanze muss in Heu hier importiert geworden sein der Selbige innerhalb der letzten 12 Monate auf einen Platz der seit einigen Jahren mit "Cooch grass" gepflanzed aufsprang nachdem Dünger darüber gesprenkelt wurden.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Die Pflanze, obgleich hart, scheint gutes Pferdefutter zu sein die Selbige es gern fressen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Die Pflanzen die ich in Nachbarschaft von Mount Norris Bay gesammelt habe werde ich Ihnen erster Gelegenheit zu senden.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: With this post I am sending you a plant whose name I would much like to know. The seed of this plant must have been imported here in hay, it sprang up within the last 12 months after manure was sprinkled over it, at a place for some years planted with "Cooch grass".

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The plant, although hard, seems to be good horse feed, they eat it willingly.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
The plants that I have collected in the neighbourhood of Mount Norris Bay,
Mountnorris Bay, NT; see P. Foelsche to M, 16 April 1883. I will send to you at the first opportunity.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
